Title: Edegarike
Writer: D. Sumana Kittur (screenplay), Agni Shridhar (dialogue), Agni Shridhar (story)
Actors: Aditya, Atul Kulkarni, Akanksha, Achyuth Kumar
Plot: Contract killer Sona decides to leave his past behind. This unnerves his powerful don who orders him killed before he can surrender but things don't go according to plan.
